attributes.action: Create a public holiday for fund raising for the life boat institute.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We live on an island and have a proud maritime tradition.
Isn't it about time that we supported those heroic life savers of the life boat institute and declare a national one day holiday to raise funds? After all, we seem to raise funds nationally for other causes such as red nose etc..
